desc: Le Dîner en Blanc is an elegant large-scale picnic from Paris that takes place in a secret location, revealed at the very last minute. Ticket-booking website for the 4th Dîner en Blanc event hosted in Kigali, Rwanda.
Rwandan tech company, Fikia. We make data available and digestible to spur innovation in business.
New Faces New Voices is a Pan-African advocacy group that focuses on expanding the role and influence of women in the financial sector.
